sect1.para: The most important source of support is the NetBSD community itself. The community section lists various resources on where to get help in case you encounter any problems.
There are also a number of consultants for hire in case you need commercial support.

sect1.title: Supported Hardware
sect1.para: In case you need to know if a certain piece of hardware is supported by NetBSD, check the list of supported hardware devices.

sect1.title: Problem Reports
sect1.para: Found a Bug? Please let us know.
Before actually submitting a report, please search the PR database to check if the issue probably already has been reported.

sect1.title: Searches
sect1.para: Not found what your were looking for? NetBSD searches offers various methods to help you find what you are looking for.

sect1.title: Security
sect1.para: NetBSD's security details and advisories can be found via the Security and NetBSD webpage.
